title: Camille - AfterShock in Bloodmoon mode
body:
Dear Riot, pls read this until the end and don't stop when you read "remove" NO I'm NOT TALKING ABOUT YASUO I SWEAR! (xD) 
Its a serious thing I'm trying to tell Riot.
I don't understand why you aka Riot don't remove Aftershock from Assassins mode like you did with Unsealed Spellbook.
Why am I asking? Cause I just played 16-17 games of Camille with that rune and the most tanky items I could find and got a pretty steady kda. But whats really crazy is that I had most damage, most tanked, no one could 1vs1 me in almost all of these games. Oh btw I had a 80% winrate.
I don't know if thats considered "op"... Buuuuuut I think yes, because assassins should get coutnered by tanks aaaaaand with that rune + build + champ... Youre basically a Tank. Land your E and you're unkillable - there are enought items that give you some ok stats like Hextrinker and Ninjatabis so this rune pops off and makes you unkillable even for Kha or Kayn. Q true damage - you killed them and youre still half Hp even when they spamed 2 full rotations of abilitys onto you. Then maybe you use youre R to dodge something or lock them down and you won.

To be honest thats it. I love camille and I had so much fun in these ~20 games but it felt too op for me to play a TANK in the ASSASSIN MODE. So I wanted to post it in the boards. (Do with the information what you want. I may be the first one to be so stupid and try to take a tank rune in an assassin mode. So this will prob. get no upvotes cause it doesn't sound that op or some crazy bug ooooh. But yeah...)

replies.body: Im Forum treiben sich keine Riotmitglieder rum nur andere Spieler
